Params: {3: 'A group of people in ragged clothing slowly emerge through the raging snowstorm.'}
{2: 'Commotion', 3: "We're not abandoned! We're not! It's a miracle... A miracle..."}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Yes. Yes, we are. Don't worry, the soldiers... They'll protect us..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Bruce was right! There really were people trapped in the church and we managed to save them all!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Settle down the civilians and check the parameters... Where's Bruce?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: "Just in front of the snow plains, there was a large crowd of corrupted mechanoids, and he told me to lead the people here first. I think he's still in battle...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Bruce! I... I need to go. Oasis squad one, prepare to move out!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...I pray that you won't cause trouble.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl', 3: 'We escaped from Snow Plain Church, walked south, and were attacked by corrupted mechanoids halfway.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'We were only saved when that brave soldier showed up leading the army.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Snow Plain Church? There are still believers of such an... ancient religion?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'And they took in so many people too...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl', 3: 'Father Snow once said that no matter their beliefs, as long as they need help, we will help.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'I was abandoned in the snow as a child and was raised by the father.', 4: '1'}
